## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hey, I've got a few questions about Verus. What's the benefit of updating to a compatible version before the mainnet activation on Tuesday at block #2549420?

**AI Assistant:**
Actually, you should update to v1.0.3 or greater before the mainnet activation on Tuesday at block #2549420. This is to ensure that you have the necessary pool merge mining improvements and other features that will be added in the non-mandatory release before mainnet activation. It's important to stay up to date to take advantage of the latest features and improvements.

**User:**
That makes sense. I've also been wondering, how do you create a token or centralized currency on the Verus network?

**AI Assistant:**
You can create a token, centralized currency, or liquidity basket AMMs on-chain, without programming, using Verus capabilities. This means that you don't need to have programming knowledge to create these assets on the Verus network. It's designed to be accessible to everyone.

**User:**
That sounds really powerful. Is it possible to buy and sell VerusIDs or NFTs on a centralized marketplace?

**AI Assistant:**
No, you can buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs on-chain, directly on the blockchain, without the need for a centralized marketplace. This allows for completely decentralized transactions, where you can execute transactions peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. It's a key part of the Verus vision for a decentralized future.

**User:**
I've also been curious about Verus Vault. What is the main purpose of Verus Vault?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus Vault is actually designed to protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key. If you lock your VerusID with Vault, you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. However, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so, and you can also still receive funds. It's an additional layer of security for your assets on the Verus network.
What is the benefit of updating to a compatible version before the mainnet activation on Tuesday at block #2549420?

Actually, you should update to v1.0.3 or greater before the mainnet activation on Tuesday at block #2549420. This is to ensure that you have the necessary pool merge mining improvements and other features that will be added in the non-mandatory release before mainnet activation.

We expect at least one more non-mandatory release before the mainnet activation, Tuesday at block #2549420, which will add some pool merge mining improvements. Please make sure you update to v1.0.3 or greater before the activation block.### Additional Verus Capabilities
- On-chain Launches of Token, Centralized Currency, and Liquidity Basket AMMs
- On-chain Launches and Merge Mining of Independent, Connected, Interoperable Blockchains without Programming
- On-chain Self Sovereign, Provable Identities, NFTs, and Individual or Organizational Profiles#### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.#### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.
